It's nice weather again today...\""},{"lineNumber":129706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハンティ様！　大変です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Hanti! There’s trouble!\""},{"lineNumber":129707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　て、敵襲！　敵襲です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"An enemy attack! An enemy attack!\""},{"lineNumber":129708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだって？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say?"},{"lineNumber":129709,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手はハンペン共和国？","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy is the Hanpen Republic?"},{"lineNumber":129710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それともカッカッカッ王国？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or the Kakkakka Kingdom?\""},{"lineNumber":129711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, actually...\""},{"lineNumber":129712,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's humans!\""},{"lineNumber":129713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーっはっはっはっはっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! Hahaha! Hahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":129714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　驚いたかイカマン共めー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Surprised, you Ikaman bastards!\""},{"lineNumber":129715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これが人間様の実力だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the true power of humans!\""},{"lineNumber":129716,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは案内された集落の人間に","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance taught the people of the guided settlement—"},{"lineNumber":129717,"originalJapaneseLine":"武器と戦術を教え、軍隊にまで育て上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"weapons and tactics, training them into an army."},{"lineNumber":129718,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして準備は整い、今、","translatedEnglishLine":"And now that preparations are complete,"},{"lineNumber":129719,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは人類軍を率いて","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance leads the human army"},{"lineNumber":129720,"originalJapaneseLine":"イカマンの支配する国へ向かっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"toward the country ruled by the Ikaman."},{"lineNumber":129721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーっはっはっはっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! Hahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":129722,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前ら、全速前進ー！　すっすめー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"All of you, full speed ahead! Advance!\""},{"lineNumber":129723,"originalJapaneseLine":"大量の人間が行軍する先頭で、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the front of the massive human march,"},{"lineNumber":129724,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは部下達に担がせた巨大な輿の上で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance sat atop a huge palanquin carried by his subordinates,"},{"lineNumber":129725,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふんぞり返って馬鹿笑いを上げていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"leaning back and laughing foolishly."},{"lineNumber":129726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいか、お前らはまーったく知らんだろうが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen up, you probably don’t know this at all,"},{"lineNumber":129727,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの街も、あの食い物も、文化的な生活も、","translatedEnglishLine":"that city, that food, the cultured way of life—"},{"lineNumber":129728,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元々は全て俺達、人間様のものだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"all originally belonged to us humans!\""},{"lineNumber":129729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それを奪ったのは誰だ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who took it away!?\""},{"lineNumber":129730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「卑怯で醜く数だけは多い、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A cowardly, ugly, but numerous being,"},{"lineNumber":129731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの白い悪魔！　イカマン共である！」","translatedEnglishLine":"those white devils! The Ikaman scum!\""},{"lineNumber":129732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「故に、これは聖戦となる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Therefore, this will be a holy war!\""},{"lineNumber":129733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我らは奴らの住み処を奪うのではない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are not merely taking away their homes!"},{"lineNumber":129734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間の誇りを取り戻すのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We are reclaiming human pride!\""},{"lineNumber":129735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イカを殺せぇぇぇーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill the squids!!\""},{"lineNumber":129736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおぉぉぉおぉぉおおおおおおッッッ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wooooaaaahhhhh!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":129737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! Hahaha! Hahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":129738,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに扇動された人類は","translatedEnglishLine":"The humans incited by Rance,"},{"lineNumber":129739,"originalJapaneseLine":"今までモンスターとして虐げられてきた者達、","translatedEnglishLine":"those who had been oppressed as monsters until now,"},{"lineNumber":129740,"originalJapaneseLine":"武器を掲げて上げる咆哮は、怒りが込められていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"their roars raising weapons were filled with anger."},{"lineNumber":129741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あわわ……大変なことに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh no... this is bad...\""},{"lineNumber":129742,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ、どうしてこのサテラが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, why is this Satella"},{"lineNumber":129743,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間に協力なんて真似を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"cooperating with humans...?"},{"lineNumber":129744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーーー……そうだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... that's right..."},{"lineNumber":129745,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつ、ああいう男だった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he was that kind of guy...\""},{"lineNumber":129746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、目覚めてすぐやることがそれって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But to do that straight after waking up...\""},{"lineNumber":129747,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大人しくしておけないもんかね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can't he just behave quietly?\""},{"lineNumber":129748,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうされますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":129749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……応戦するよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...We will fight back."},{"lineNumber":129750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　許す限りの最大人数でね。","translatedEnglishLine":"With the maximum number allowed.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、説得だけでモンスターを静めたぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you calmed the monsters with just persuasion..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがハンティ様だ」
「うむ、さすがはイカマン帝国の守り神様だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, as expected of the guardian deity of the Ikaman Empire..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごい慕われようだな……
だが、イカに慕われても嬉しくないだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you probably wouldn't be happy to be adored by squids."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう慣れたよ」
また、イカのハンティ――
通称イカンティは触腕をうにゃうにゃさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nicknamed Ikanti, he wiggled his tentacles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからランスはハンティ案内のもと、
人間の集落へ案内され、そこで平和的に過ごした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was led to a human settlement where he lived peacefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一ヶ月だけ。
一ヶ月後――
「ふう……今日もいい天気だ……」
「ハンティ様！　大変です！
て、敵襲！　敵襲です！」
「なんだって？
相手はハンペン共和国？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy is the Hanpen Republic?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それともカッカッカッ王国？」
「そ、それが……」
「人類です！」
「がーーーっはっはっはっはっ！
驚いたかイカマン共めー！
これが人間様の実力だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the true power of humans!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは案内された集落の人間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance taught the people of the guided settlement—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器と戦術を教え、軍隊にまで育て上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: weapons and tactics, training them into an army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして準備は整い、今、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now that preparations are complete,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは人類軍を率いて
イカマンの支配する国へ向かっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: toward the country ruled by the Ikaman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーっはっはっはっ！
お前ら、全速前進ー！　すっすめー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All of you, full speed ahead! Advance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の人間が行軍する先頭で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the front of the massive human march,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは部下達に担がせた巨大な輿の上で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sat atop a huge palanquin carried by his subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふんぞり返って馬鹿笑いを上げていた。
「いいか、お前らはまーったく知らんだろうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen up, you probably don’t know this at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの街も、あの食い物も、文化的な生活も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that city, that food, the cultured way of life—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は全て俺達、人間様のものだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all originally belonged to us humans!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それを奪ったのは誰だ！？」
「卑怯で醜く数だけは多い、
あの白い悪魔！　イカマン共である！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those white devils! The Ikaman scum!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「故に、これは聖戦となる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore, this will be a holy war!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我らは奴らの住み処を奪うのではない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are not merely taking away their homes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の誇りを取り戻すのだ！」
「イカを殺せぇぇぇーーーッ！」
「うおおぉぉぉおぉぉおおおおおおッッッ！！！！」
「がーーーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
ランスに扇動された人類は
今までモンスターとして虐げられてきた者達、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those who had been oppressed as monsters until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器を掲げて上げる咆哮は、怒りが込められていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their roars raising weapons were filled with anger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あわわ……大変なことに……」
「くそ、どうしてこのサテラが
人間に協力なんて真似を……」
「あーーー……そうだ……
あいつ、ああいう男だった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was that kind of guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、目覚めてすぐやることがそれって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But to do that straight after waking up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大人しくしておけないもんかね」
「どうされますか？」
「……応戦するよ。
許す限りの最大人数でね。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

あの白い悪魔！　イカマン共である！」
